name: Trial Of The Nomad
description:
Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to Look, Shift to Sprint, Left Click to attack, Hold C to Crouch, Middle Mouse to Slide, Spacebar to Jump, Right Click to Teleport. (Some in-game tutorial text is inaccurate so refer back to here if you get stuck on controls, thank you) 

This is a Whitebox demo for what could have been made into a full release.

My role for this project was as follows:

- Level Design (whitebox)

- Mechanic Design

- 3D Art (Modelled the majority of the final assets) 

Made by a team of 4.  Other members:

Jay Paris - Programming, Mechanic Design and Art

Brandon Lewis - 3D Assets, Concepting

George Jagger - Miscellaneous Assets
